items.title: Real-time Task Updates
items.description: Enable team members to see task changes instantly across all devices.
acceptance_criteria: Task status changes are visible to all team members within 2 seconds.
Newly created tasks appear in the shared task list without manual refresh.
Edits to task details are reflected in real-time for all viewers.
non_functional: System latency for updates must be under 2 seconds.
Support at least 100 concurrent users without performance degradation.

notes: The requirement was vague; assumed the need for real-time collaboration as a key feature of team task management. Additional features like chat, file sharing, or notifications may be needed but are not specified.
